trans-unit.source: Specifies an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key for use with the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> class.
<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> objects are used in key exchanges with <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> objects.
Gets the key BLOB format for a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"></xref> object.
The format that the key BLOB is expressed in.

Exports the key and explicit curve parameters used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"></xref> object into an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters"></xref> object.
The key and explicit curve parameters used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"></xref> object.
The method cannot obtain curve values.
Explicit export is not supported by this platform.
Windows 10 or higher is required.
Exports the key used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"></xref> object into an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters"></xref> object.

If the key was created as a named curve, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters?displayProperty=fullName> field contains named curve parameters; otherwise, it contains explicit parameters.
The key and named curve parameters used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve"></xref> object.
The method cannot obtain curve values.
Converts a byte array that contains a public key to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"></xref> object according to the specified format.
This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.
A byte array that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key.
An object that specifies the format of the key BLOB.
An object that contains the ECDH public key that is serialized in the byte array.
The publicKeyBlob or format parameter is `null`.
The publicKeyBlob parameter does not contain an key.
Converts an XML string to an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"></xref> object.
This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.
An XML string that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key.
An object that contains the ECDH public key that is specified by the given XML.
The xml parameter is `null`.
The xml parameter does not specify an key.
Converts the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object.
An object that contains the key represented by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"></xref> object.
Serializes the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"></xref> public key to an XML string in RFC 4050 format.
See <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat?displayProperty=fullName>for information about the XML format that this method uses.
An XML string that contains the serialized <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey"></xref> public key.
